    • Hello, I'm

    Sofyen Nefzi

    Full-Stack Developer | Spring Boot & Angular Specialist

    Get To Know More

    About Me

    Experience

    6 months
    Full-Stack Development at CNSS

    Education

    1- Bac Informatique
    2- Licence en Business Computing (ESEN)

    I am a creative developer who enjoys pushing boundaries and finding innovative solutions. With strong communication skills and a collaborative nature, I thrive in team environments. My critical thinking helps me analyze situations effectively, and I consistently meet deadlines to deliver quality results on time.

    Explore My

    Skills

    Backend Development

    Spring Boot (Java)

    Oracle Database

    PostgreSQL

    REST APIs

    Spring Security & JWT

    JavaMail (Email Recovery)

    Frontend Development

    Angular (TypeScript)

    HTML/CSS

    JavaScript

    Bootstrap

    Other Skills

    Python

    PHP

    Linux

    Git & GitHub

    Docker

    Certifications

    Google Cybersecurity

    Professional Certificate

    Microsoft Azure

    Cloud Services

    Spring Boot (Coursera)

    IoC, DI, MVC & REST

    English (B2)

    EF SET

    Browse My Recent

    Projects

    ESEN Joker Club

    University club promotional website

    ESEN Joker Club Website

    Designed and developed the official website for our university's Joker Club. Features include event calendars, member profiles, and photo galleries. Implemented responsive design for all devices and optimized loading times.

    HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript Bootstrap

    Hotel Booking

    Complete reservation system

    Hotel Booking System

    A comprehensive hotel management system with room booking functionality, admin dashboard, and payment integration. Developed as my final year project with secure user authentication and database management.

    PHP MySQL JavaScript jQuery

    Gourmet Restaurant

    Elegant dining website

    ️ Gourmet Restaurant

    Modern restaurant website with online reservation system, interactive menu, and food gallery. Focused on creating an elegant UI with smooth animations and intuitive navigation for the best user experience.

    React CSS Modules Node.js

    YouTube Downloader

    Video download application

    YouTube Video Downloader

    Desktop application that downloads YouTube videos in multiple formats and resolutions. Includes progress tracking, playlist support, and quality selection options.

    Python Tkinter Pytube

    Ping Pong

    Classic arcade game

    Classic Ping Pong

    A retro-style ping pong game with score tracking, difficulty levels, and multiplayer support. Built to understand game physics and real-time user input handling.

    Python Turtle Game Dev

    Tic Tac Toe

    AI-powered game

    ❌⭕ AI Tic Tac Toe

    Classic Tic Tac Toe with adjustable AI difficulty. Features include score history, player vs player mode, and responsive design that works on both desktop and mobile devices.

    JavaScript Minimax Algorithm Responsive Design

    Explore In-Depth

    Featured Project: CNSS Data Management Platform

    Full-Stack Web Application - CNSS Tunisia (2025)

    As part of my internship at the Caisse Nationale de Sécurité Sociale (CNSS) in Tunis (MED 5), I developed a secure web-based application for internal data management and automation.

    Backend: Spring Boot, REST APIs, Spring Security, JWT
    Frontend: Angular (TypeScript), HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap
    ⚙️ Core Feature: API Middleware to auto-extract and populate databases

    API Integration Interface

    Data Visualization Dashboard

    Advanced Data Filtering

    Data Loading Panel

    Explore In-Depth

    Featured Project: CNSS Admin CRUD System

    Admin Management System - CNSS Tunisia (2025)

    Developed a comprehensive admin dashboard with full CRUD functionality for user and data management.

    • Complete user management dashboard
    • Create/Read/Update/Delete operations
    • Advanced filtering and sorting
    • Bulk data import/export
    • Activity audit logs

    Admin Login Panel

    User Management Dashboard

    Get in Touch

    Contact Me

    sofien.nefzi@esen.tn

    LinkedIn

    • Skills
    • Projects
    • Contact

    Interested in working together? Let’s talk.
